entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
